lead_paragraph: FORREST--Ruth, 92, on February 13 at Meadow Ridge, Redding, CT. Formerly of Chappaqua, NY, Wilton, CT and Sachems Head, CT. An avid reader of New York Times Sunday edition. Survived by daughters Leslie (Warren) Houghton of Leesburg, FL, Noel (Bruce) Konrad of Wilton, CT and Jennifer (David) Sonenshein of Bala Cynwyd, PA, six grandchildren and nine great-grandhildren. Donations to Dysautonomia Foundation, 315 West 39th St., #
